comments:
Found in WSWB 3.0 M8 I20040310 + Hyades 3.0 20040316_1729 driver.

Steps to reproduce:
-------------------
1. Start Eclipse.
2. Window -> Preferences.
3. Expand Profiling and Logging.

You will see that there's a weird looking string: %%LARGE_LOG_SUPPORT_PAGE

If you click on it, you will get a pop-up error message that looks (sort of) 
like this...

------------------------------------------------
Preference Page Creation Problems

Unable to create the selected preference page.

Reason:
Plug-in org.eclipse.hyades.log.ui was unable to load class
org.eclipse.hyades.log.ui.internal.preferences.LargeLogSupportPreferencePage
------------------------------------------------

The .log file contents is included below...
